alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 8:13AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Daniels, northern Roosevelt and Sheridan Counties through 915 AM MDT... At 813 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Port Of Raymond, or 7 miles north of Plentywood, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Scobey, Medicine Lake, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Bredette, Redstone, Whitetail, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Comertown, Mccabe, Coalridge and Dagmar. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Daniels; Eastern Roosevelt; Sheridan; Western Roosevelt
